snippet.title: FACEMINER: ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER' FOR 'FACEMINER' (VIDEO GAME)
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2276980/FACEMINER/

FACEMINER is a narrative-driven strategy clicker game set in an alternate technological past. Classify biometric data, manage data-mining infrastructure and shape the world's fate in this devastating portrait of white-collar destruction told through the medium of 90s corporate software.

Do you have what it takes to climb the ranks and become the ultimate FACEMINER?
